settings.heading: Actual Item Pictured
settings.content: We take the time to photograph every used item.Â When you buy from us you are getting the item you see in the photos.

settings.title: Lens Optics
settings.text: Although minor dust and scratching won't affect image quality, major defects like haze, fungus, or separation cause decreased sharpness and contrast. We inspect every lens and provide cleaning & repair when appropriate. Otherwise, we clearly state any flaws in lens optics in our product descriptions.

settings.title: Lens Mechanics
settings.text: Our skilled team of technicians also work diligently to ensure that our lenses have appropriately functioning mechanics. They test focal throw, zoom, aperture stop-down, filter threads, and all applicable electronic functions (like autofocus).

settings.title: Infinity Focusing & Rangefinder Alignment
settings.text: Our collimator is used to simulate infinity focus for the purpose of ensuring lens alignment & focus at any distance. We also use a special high-contrast target board to ensure that rangefinders are properly aligned both vertically & horizontally.

settings.title: Calibration & Repair
settings.text: Many lenses require extra work beyond testing & checking. Our mechanics are able to repair lens diaphragms, calibrate focus, adjust helicoids, and install spare or replacement parts as necessary.
Do you have unused camera gear laying around? We buy cameras, lenses, and accessories of all ages. Sell for cash or trade-in for something new.
